document.full_text: syrians fled a restive town toward the turkish border, fearing bloodshed as troops with tanks approached, under orders to hit back after the government accused armed bands there of killing scores of its security men.
document.title: syrians flee town as troops approach
lines_and_colors: syrians fled a restive town toward the turkish border, fearing bloodshed as troops with tanks approached, under orders to hit back after the government accused armed bands there of killing scores of its security men.
